channel.title: [delta][317]Transforming items[delta][317]
channel.description:
Hi im having trouble finding out how to make an object turn you into any npc, or object. Soucer: [Delta] [317] Like Easter ring = Easter egg(s) ring of stone = Iron rock Mourner cloak = penguin
or something like that. pls help :confused:
